DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether patients undergoing coronary intervention that also require oral anticoagulation, treatment with the COBRA PzF stent plus 14-day dual anti-platelet therapy (DAPT) has higher safety and non-inferior outcomes for thrombo-embolic events than compared with standard FDA-approved drug eluting stent (DES) plus 6-month DAPT.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial of COBRA PzF Stenting to Reduce Duration of Triple Therapy
